so I would assume so
are you still talking about with the new 8.32.5 drivers?
yes
well i cant get mine to run under ati for opengl, its saying that stupid mesa
it will be very slow though because ati lacks the extension to accelerate it fast enough
any way 3rd party drivers or something to get it running?
hmm
not much you can do except buy an nvidia card :(
crossover office runs itunes the best but is a commercial product
you are better off with amarok or exile
